name: Budding Biologist - Lizard Island
blurb: An ecological video game to teach elementary aged children how to think like a scientist.

rewards.reward: THANK YOU: Personalized thank you on Facebook and Twitter
DISCUSSION FORUM: Access to exclusive forum where we will include you in discussions on design and incorporate your ideas into the game.
THE GAMES: A copy of the 3 games plus access to the discussion forum
DIGITAL ART BOOK: Receive a copy of the digital artwork book, copies of the three games, access to the discussion forum, and your name in the credits.
BETA TESTER: Beta test each of the games prior to release as well as receive copies of the games, access to the discussion forum, and your name in the credits.
PRINTED ART BOOK: Receive a copy of the printed artwork book, copies of the three games, access to the discussion forum, and your name in the credits.
HOME LICENSE: Receive a single home license for the school game package, complete with lesson plans, worksheets and assessment tools \u2013 great for homeschoolers or after-school care.

CLASSROOM LICENSE:  A classroom license for the final package (includes the lesson plans, worksheets and assessment tools tied in with common core standards) and one year of tech support/upgrades.  (collective donations where you pull together friends, family, parents and teachers to donate to one teacher or school will also receive this award. Remember, each of them needs to leave a comment in the comments section with the name of the teacher and school who will be receiving the donation! Backers may also want to include the amount donated to provide incentive for others to match those donations.)

SCHOOL LICENSE WITH 1 YEAR SUPPORT: The school of your choice will receive licenses for ALL the classrooms for the individual apps as well as a classroom license for the final package (includes the lesson plans, worksheets and assessment tools tied in with common core standards). This package also provides one year of free tech support and upgrades with the game. (collective donations that pull together friends, family, parents and teachers to donate to one teacher or school will also get this award. Remember, each of them needs to leave a comment in the comments section with the name of the teacher and school who will be receiving the donation! Backers may also want to include the amount donated to provide incentive for others to match those donations.)

SCHOOL LICENSE WITH 5 YEARS SUPPORT: The school of your choice will receive licenses for all the classrooms for the individual apps as well as a classroom license for the final package (includes the lesson plans, worksheets and assessment tools tied in with common core standards). This package also provides 5 years of free tech support and upgrades with the game. (collective donations that pull together friends, family, parents and teachers to donate to one teacher or school will also get this award. Remember, each of them needs to leave a comment in the comments section with the name of the teacher and school who will be receiving the donation! Backers may also want to include the amount donated to provide incentive for others to match those donations.)
